name: Logical Operation
description: Performs logical operations on multiple input values

minMsgCount.label: Minimum message count
minMsgCount.description: Minimum number of messages for the operation

help.description: Performs logical operations (AND, OR, NOT, XOR, NAND, NOR, XNOR) on boolean values from multiple messages. Extends Logical Switch with multi-input logic.

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Boolean input values to be combined using the logical operation

result.name: result
result.description: Boolean result of the logical operation

details.text: Configure matchers to collect boolean values from different messages. Messages are matched and collected until the minimum message count is reached.
Supported operations: AND (all true), OR (any true), NOT (invert), XOR (exactly one true), NAND (not all true), NOR (none true), XNOR (all same).
Set 'Minimum message count' to specify how many boolean inputs must be received before evaluating the operation.
Inherits Logical Switch features: custom true/false values, separated outputs, property targeting, and debounce settings.
Useful for combining multiple sensor states, implementing safety interlocks, or building complex boolean logic.
